title: Lisa Scottoline
desc: Lisa Scottoline is a? New York Times? bestselling author and Edgar award-winning author of 24 novels. She also writes a weekly column for the? Philadelphia Inquirer? with her daughter entitled "Chick Wit."? The event will be held at the Somerset County Vo-Tech auditorium, 14 Vogt Dr, Bridgewater, NJ. Doors open at 9:15am. Lecture with Q&A at 10am, with a book signing following at 11am. This event is FREE, but registration is required. The first 300 registrants will receive Lisa Scottoline's recent novel? Every Fifteen Minutes . Books will be distributed at the event.
